# Алгоритмы выравнивания

## Emboss

```{bash}
#| eval: false
conda install emboss
```

### Needle

It reads two input sequences and writes their optimal global sequence alignment to file. The Needleman-Wunsch algorithm

-   The gap open penalty is the score taken away when a gap is created.
-   The gap extension,penalty is added to the standard gap penalty for each base or residue in the gap.

```{bash}
#| eval: false
needle Структуры_данных/01.10.25/seq1.fasta Структуры_данных/01.10.25/seq2.fasta \
-gapopen 10 -gapextend 0.5 -outfile Структуры_данных/01.10.25/nw_result.txt
```

### Water

Smith-Waterman local alignment of sequences

```{bash}
#| eval: false
water Структуры_данных/01.10.25/seq1.fasta Структуры_данных/01.10.25/seq2.fasta \
-gapopen 10 -gapextend 0.5 -outfile Структуры_данных/01.10.25/sw_result.txt
```

## MUSCLE

(MUltiple Sequence Comparison by Log-Expectation) is a command-line program for multiple sequence alignment of protein and nucleotide sequences

```{bash}
#| eval: false
conda install -c bioconda muscle
```

```{bash}
#set -euo pipefail

IN="Структуры_данных/01.10.25/cycs_set.fasta"
BASE="Структуры_данных/01.10.25/cycs_muscle"

muscle -align "$IN" -output "${BASE}.aln.fasta" -threads 4 -maxiters 32 -log "${BASE}.log"

echo "Готово: ${BASE}.aln.fasta"
```

```{bash}
echo 'cycs_muscle.aln.fasta'
cat Структуры_данных/01.10.25/cycs_muscle.aln.fasta
```

```{bash}
echo 'cycs_muscle.log'
cat Структуры_данных/01.10.25/cycs_muscle.log
```
